name: Oliver Perez
summary: Oliver is an iOS Jr Adv developer with 1 year experience, both for personal and professional projects.

sections.title: About
sections.summary: Oliver Has 1 year experience developing iOS apps both for personal and professional projects. He worked as iOS Developer Jr at PagaTodo in the app Ya Ganaste and “YaBaaS” using VIPER architecture, Swift 3 and 4, Storyboards, XIBs, programmatic views, consuming REST APIs, using git-flow workflow and Jira.

workPlaces.name: Inoma A.C.
workPlaces.description: Oliver worked 2 years developing educational videogames using Unity 3D and C#.

workPlaces.name: PagaTodo
workPlaces.description: Oliver worked 3 months as iOS Developer Jr in the payments module for the app YaGanaste and the internal project YaBaas.

sections.title: Hobbies
sections.summary: I love to play the piano and the guitar, mostly classical music and also my own compositions. Also, I really like to ride my bike around the city.
